import React, { useContext } from 'react' import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import './Navbar.css' import DataContext from '../Context/Context' const Navbar = () => { const {loadingEffect} = useContext(DataContext) let currentPage = useLocation() currentPage = currentPage.pathname.substring(1); currentPage = currentPage.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + currentPage.slice(1) console.log(currentPage) return (

) } export default Navbar
